page.title: 01Tipton My Home Town.
page.content: Tipton is in the heart of the Black Country,with many factories and steel works,but many of the factories are closing down because of the economic recession.It is not surprising that there is nearly 20% unemployment in this area.There are some very skilled people who, because of the economic situation are stuck at home.The{houses in Tipton are mainly Victorian and because of their age are in bad repair.This is a problem, since fewer houses are being built because people cannot afford to buy them. Many{shops}are closing down because people only buy essential goods,and cannot afford luxury items. Shops are not making money like they did in the past,and with bills so high it is not surprising that so many are closing down.
